BEAUTIFUL VILLA IN LOECHES.GARAGE WITH CAPACITY FOR THREE CARS Stop looking for a home in Loeches, you will love this chalet! Do you want to live in calm, away from the hustle and bustle of the capital? Would you like a quiet home, free of noise and rush? Here is your ideal home, between Madrid and Alcalá de Henares, in the beautiful municipality of Loeches. DISTRIBUTION: Pemar Agents offers you this exclusive semi-detached house of 260m2 -according to cadastre- and 172 m2 of plot whose distribution is as follows: Front plot with garden area and access to porch and interior of the house: MAIN FLOOR -Entrance hall. -Separate, spacious and bright kitchen.Comfortable and practical room with enough space to eat.High and low cabinets.Totally equiped. -Courtesy bathroom with shower tray.Towel radiator. -Very spacious room.Exterior window and built-in wardrobe and dress. -Separate living room, spacious and bright thanks to the natural light it receives through its large window.Direct exit to patio. -Patio with charming wooden gazebo. FIRST FLOOR -Main room, spacious and bright with two spectacular 4-section closets, lined, dressed and with drawers... all your clothes at hand! -Spacious, complete master suite bathroom.Double sink and whirlpool tub. -Spacious and bright room.Exterior window.Built-in wardrobe lined and dressed. -Spacious and bright room.Wardrobe with the same characteristics.Glass door with access to terrace. -Full bathroom with bathtub. ATTIC Without a doubt it is the jewel of this beautiful home! 24m2 space with low, wall-to-wall built-in wardrobes.With a multitude of possibilities.Exit to a 17m2 solarium terrace.Here you will find the desired peace and rest... The silence, accompanied by spectacular panoramic views, will make you fall in love. LOW LEVEL -Storage room.Practical space used in the stairwell. -55 m2 garage.Automatic door.Capacity for 3 cars. HOUSING CHARACTERISTICS -Plated, stoneware and marble floors. -Smooth paint on walls and ceiling. -Built-in oak wood wardrobes, lined, dressed and with drawers. - Double glazed windows with mosquito nets. -A/C in living room, main room and attic.Pre-installation throughout the home. -Indirect lighting in the living room and staircase. -Radiators in all rooms. -Natural gas.Rock Caldera. EVERYTHING WE SAY ABOUT THIS BEAUTIFUL CHALET WOULD BE LITTLE.CALL US AND WE INVITE YOU TO VISIT IT! LOCATION: The house is located in a residential area, near the center of Loeches, with all the basic services at hand: commercial establishments of all kinds, banks, supermarkets, pharmacies, doctor's office, senior center, public schools such as Conde Duque de Olivares, Duke of Alba and Charles Dickens and private ones like Montfort. With very good public transport communication as it has 5 bus lines: 2 connected with Madrid (1 at night) and 3 with other municipalities in the area (Arganda del Rey, Alcalá de Henares, Coslada, San Fernando and Velilla de San Antonio, as well as with the Torrejón University Hospital and the Henares Hospital).For your own vehicle, it has convenient road access (A2, A3 and M50). TAXES AND EXPENSES NOT INCLUDED: ITP, NOTARY, REGISTRATION, MANAGEMENT, APPRAISAL.WE WILL HELP YOU WITH THE FINANCING IF YOU NEED IT. TOTAL TRANSPARENCY AND DIRECT DEALING WITH THE PROPERTY.

Welcome to this spectacular New York style home in the municipality of Loeches! It is a home with all kinds of quality details. Completely renovated and modernized, this home is perfect for those looking for an elegant and comfortable home. With a high investment in the details of the reform since it is ideal to move into directly. Upon entering, you will be greeted by a charming hall with designer furniture and a closet, perfect for storing everything you need. A long hallway gives access to the rest of the house. The open-plan living room with a built-in kitchen is the ideal place to share moments with your loved ones. In addition, it has a chaise longue with a built-in bed and an adjoining closet for storage. The large windows with automatic/electric blinds provide plenty of natural light and views of the terrace. The spacious, independent room has a large window (light opaque windows), as well as a built-in wardrobe with white sliding doors. (All new design and construction) The adjoining bathroom with shower and pretty vanity is perfect for relaxing after a long day. With modern and detailed decoration. The terrace is ideal for enjoying private evenings and relaxing outdoors. It has a nice space with plants, barbecue and storage. The house is sold empty, without furniture. Only kitchen furniture and appliances fit. This complex has security, doorman, paddle/tennis court and private pools, everything you need to live comfortably! Regarding location, the municipality of Loeches has a population of 8,791 inhabitants and borders several municipalities in the area. In addition, it has 5 bus lines that connect with Madrid and other municipalities. Public nursery schools and Early Childhood and Primary Education schools are available, as well as the possibility of taking ESO at SIES Luis de Góngora and a private school from nursery to pre-university. You will also find supermarkets, shops, pharmacies and other infrastructure in the municipality. The price includes a garage space and includes kitchen appliances. We offer advice on financing and expansion of available information. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this home during long hours, including weekends!

Spectacular villa in Loeches, on a large corner plot, facing south west, always sunny. Unique in the area due to its dimensions and location, providing great privacy, so much so that it feels like we are on an independent plot. It has an extraordinary design and construction pool. In addition, we find different establishments that enrich it, barbecue, dining room, shed, etc. Through a beautiful hall we enter a cozy living room, and not cozy due to its size, this term used so many times not to say small. In this case, quite the opposite, a large living room with a wrought iron fireplace, a set of centuries-old wooden beams, high-quality parquet flooring, everything perfectly harmonized, offering an environment that exudes warmth, quality and elegance. Another piece of the house that is difficult to forget is the kitchen, an idyllic place to give free rein to your restorative and culinary instincts, as it offers us large dimensions, an impressive countertop and dining area, with direct access to the garden. The rest of the floor is made up of a large garage and toilet. On the first floor we have a nice full shared bathroom. There are also three of the four bedrooms. Of them two large bedrooms with elegant furniture and built-in wardrobes. The master bedroom is simply extraordinary, we once again find those wonderful sets of beams, spectacular flooring and balcony. They finish configuring a wonderful bathroom complete with an oversized shower tray with a hydromassage column. The attic floor provides us with a large studio, equipped with different settings, living room, bedroom and office. It offers us the possibility of installing a bathroom. In summary, this chalet appears to offer a unique combination of space, design, privacy and amenities, making it an attractive place to live or spend leisure time. If you are considering this property, I would recommend contacting a real estate agent for more details and exploring the possibility of visiting it to appreciate it in person.

The project has been designed in such a way that you can have the best orientation in each of the rooms, providing the comfort of achieving the best luminosity along with the most absolute tranquility. High-quality construction with Energy Certification A thanks to the materials used, highlighting the low costs and high levels of well-being derived from the aerothermal equipment that produces domestic hot water, heating and cooling, through the underfloor heating/cooling that can be used both in winter like in summer. Its location is privileged, close to the municipalities of Torrejón de Ardoz, Alcalá de Henares, Arganda del Rey and 20 minutes from Madrid, it is a town that has all the necessary services: supermarkets, educational, health, sports, parks. and a great leisure offer.

INMOVELILLA exclusively presents this magnificent opportunity in the town of Loeches. This property has two large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a separate living room with access to the patio of the house as well as the kitchen (which is furnished, with high and low furniture), a full bathroom. Wooden floors (AC5 quality), built-in wardrobes, double glazed windows, electric heating. The house has a parking space included in the price, and the urbanization has a swimming pool and common areas. Loeches is located in the Corredor de Henares area, very close to Madrid Capital, and the city of Alcalá de Henares. It has a health center and several bus lines. Fees and taxes outside the price of the home. If you need financing, our financial department provides up to 100% financing (subject to conditions). We are located at Calle Mayor 3 in Velilla de San Antonio.

New promotion of 52 EXCLUSIVE homes for free rent in Loeches, C / Manzanilla, 4. Promoted by Residencial Tres, S. Coop. Mad(in constitution). The promotion has a modern design located in the area of greatest expansion. 5 minutes from the center of the municipality. 2 and 3 bedroom homes in a 3-story building. All homes have large terraces from 10 m2 to 130.83 m2. Video intercom, concierge, playground, adult pool and children's pool. oThe houses have a garage and a large storage room in the basement, with the option of acquiring a second place. Furnished kitchen (without appliances), heated towel rail in main bathroom, white lacquered interior carpentry, AC4 floor tiles and stoneware, smooth plastic paint, armored entrance door. Because of its great design and distribution, HESTIA HOMES becomes the best price-quality promotion of Loeches.

MAGNIFICENT SEMI-DETACHED VILLA IN THE CENTER OF LOECHES, on Granada street. This property has 4 bedrooms, 2 double living rooms, kitchen-dining room, 2 full bathrooms and 2 toilets. In addition, it has a terrace-solarium and a large patio with garden areas. You can enjoy the community pool that adjoins the chalet.   The condition of the property is impeccable, since it has been renovated. With a constructed area of 280m², this chalet is distributed over different floors. On the ground floor you will find a large garage, a toilet, a kitchen, a double living room with access to a terrace-solarium and a patio which is 50% paved and 50% with well-kept garden areas. On the entrance floor, there is a porch leading to the entrance hall-hall, a toilet, a kitchen-dining room and a double living room with direct access to a terrace-solarium and patio. On the first floor, there are 3 large and bright double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom. On the second floor, there is a large open space that can be used as a fourth bedroom or living room, a spectacular dressing room and a full bathroom with a double sink. All essential services are within reach, such as medical centers, pharmacies, schools, supermarkets, small businesses, restaurants and gas stations. In addition, it has excellent intercity bus communication just a few minutes away. We offer free advisory service and above all emphasize that the buyer does not have to pay any real estate intermediation costs.

Globalpiso sells duplexes in Loeches. Gated community with parking space, 2 large swimming pools with extensive green and living areas, soccer, tennis and paddle tennis courts, 2nd floor of the building with elevator. The house is distributed in: Two bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, large living room with dining area and 3 meter high ceiling, kitchen, large patio with built-in barbecue, Property qualities: stoneware floor, smooth walls, pellet heating great caloric power and very efficient. Very bright house. In the surroundings we can count on all the essential services: Medical Center, Pharmacies, Schools, Supermarkets, Public transportation. Quick trip to the center of Madrid via the A3 or R3. You can visit all our properties at or if you wish, you can download our completely free Globalpiso APP. *Globalpiso never requests documentation or money without visiting the home* *Possibility of 100% financing through our h2b Mortgages financial department, totally free and no-obligation advice. -Obtaining financing is subject to the conditions of the financial institution and will take into account the profile and solvency of the client. *According to Art. 6 of RD 515/1989, of April 21, the client is informed that notarial, registration, I. T. P. or equivalent, financial expenses and other expenses inherent to the sale are not included in the sale price of the home. For more information ask for Iván.

Element model One floor with three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a private individual POOL included in the price! The base model of "Dynamic Homes" is called Element. On a single floor we will have all the comforts to live fully. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a swimming pool, an outdoor garage and a laundry room lay the foundations of a life yet to be built.
